snippet: The Yankees bashed home runs on their way to victories all season, but after Game 1 of the A.L. division series against Baltimore, the question arises whether the long ball will be enough.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Baseball column says the New York Yankees bashed home runs on their way to victories all season, but after Game 1 of the AL division series against the Baltimore Orioles, question arises whether the long ball will be enough.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees bashed home runs on their way to victories all season, but after Game 1 of the A.L. division series against Baltimore, the question arises whether the long ball will be enough.

headline.seo: Yankees Decide Not to Count on Their Power
headline.main: A Team Used to Trotting Shows a Bit of Dashing
headline.print_headline: A Team Used to Trotting Shows a Bit of Dashing
